00016 /**
00017  * Class-registry, a pseudo-singleton wrapper. Used to memorize and return all classes we did already instanciate.
00018  * @package kata
00019  */
00020 class classRegistry {
00021 
00022              /**
00023               * array to save objects of any classed created
00024               * @var array
00025               */
00026              static private $objects = array();
00027 
00028              /**
00029               * return an instance of the class given in $name. If the class does not exist yet, create it.
00030               *
00031      * @param string $name name of the class to return an instance of
00032      * @param string $key to create the same class more than once. uses simple caching to return consistency
00033      */
00034              static function &getObject($name,$key='') {
00035                           $objname = $name.(empty($key)?'':'/').$key;
00036 
00037                           if (!isset(self::$objects[$objname])) {
00038                                self::$objects[$objname]=new $name;
00039                           }
00040                           return self::$objects[$objname];
00041              }
00042 
00043              /**
00044               * return all classes in the cache. used for debugging
00045               * @return array cache-array
00046               */
00047              static function getLoadedClasses() {
00048                           return self::$objects;
00049              }
00050 
00051 }
